items.name: FLAT
desc: forces one normal per flat part.
With FLAT shading, the faces of the object are rendered in a solid color.

items.name: SPECIFIC
desc: does not produce standard normals, but leaves the object-specific ones untouched.

items.name: SPHERE
desc: forces normals to think that the object is a sphere.
This value forces projection to wrapping in X and/or Y.
